body: To add an LPA without an activation key, you’ll need to enter some information from the paper LPA. Make sure you have it with you before continuing.

components.html:
* If someone else has the paper LPA, you’ll need to get the information from them
* If the paper LPA has been lost or destroyed, you can ask the Office of the Public Guardian for an office copy by calling 0300 456 0300 - office copies cost £35
components.summary: If you do not have the paper LPA

components.hint:
The registration date is on **section 1** (page 1) of the paper LPA.

[% hint.date %]
components.name: auto_name__6

heading: Add an LPA without an activation key
lede: Only LPAs registered after September 2019 can be added to your account.
